description: Explore leadership ethics, focusing on decision-making and accountability. Learn to recognize biases, prioritize transparency, and foster a culture of integrity. Practical scenarios and real-world examples will guide you in developing a strong moral compass, essential for effective leadership.

key_concepts.definition: The moral principles that guide leaders in making decisions
A personal guide for making ethical decisions

generated_text:
"Module 17: Ethics" (22 minutes, Intermediate)
Explore leadership ethics, focusing on decision-making and accountability. Learn to recognize biases, prioritize transparency, and foster a culture of integrity. Practical scenarios and real-world examples will guide you in developing a strong moral compass, essential for effective leadership.
